name: Witch Tea?
description:
"Witch Tea?" is a light-hearted crafting visual novel created for JamCraft 7. 

Play as a tea maker on planet Serentree, and help your alien customers by brewing the an-tea-dotes to their problems. 

Your choices will affect the outcomes!

---

- CREDITS -

WRITING, 2D ART, MUSIC & CODING: Amanda Li 

3D BACKGROUND ART: Alexander Mathieson
